title: If your preferred picks is ezreal or nidalee
body:
fastest ban NA I don't care. I'm doing us all a favor from your negative damage. Everyone has to yasuo. Everyone thinks they are the best yasuo.

Everyone has to ezreal. Everyone thinks they are the best ezreal. Not on my watch son. Your gonna play a real champ and provide for your team.

I don't think I need to elaborate on bronze or silver nidalees.
